com.ibm.team.repository.common.json

Class JSONArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList
          • com.ibm.team.repository.common.json.JSONArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJSONSerializable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class JSONArray
extends java.util.ArrayList
implements IJSONSerializable
    Extension of ArrayList that only allows values which are JSON-able. See JSONObject for a list of valid values. Instances of this class are not thread-safe.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
